subject: Delivered to Poland
description_text: Do you send parcels to Poland? I can't find it on the list, so I can't buy it, even though the phone number is immediately the Polish flag

conversations.body_text: Hi Patryk. misiak,     Customers in Poland can place orders directly through our Polish distributor, and the products will be shipped locally from Poland.Â   https://fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product_brand=Simsonn
